name: Terrific Tennis
description:
A terrific, pocket-sized game of tennis made for GBJAM9.

Created by Batfeula and Jonah_SRG.

CONTROLS:

ARROWS: Move

Z: Backhand Swing

X: Forehand Swing

LEFT + Z: Diving Backhand Swing

RIGHT + X: Diving Forehand Swing

Batfeula: https://twitter.com/batfeula

Jonah_SRG: https://twitter.com/jonah_srg
